Key Match Events: Karl-Anthony Towns delivered an outstanding performance with 26 points, 15 rebounds, and six assists.
Josh Hart averaged 14 points, 9.4 rebounds, and 7.8 assists over his last five games.
OG Anunoby has been improving offensively, averaging 22 points per game over his last five outings.
Mikal Bridges scored over 20 points in back-to-back games against his former team.
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks’ Battle of the Boroughs has been another success.
Defeating Bridges‘ former team likely provided some extra motivation in this back-to-back matchup.
New York approached both games differently, with Brunson leading the charge in the first game and Towns in the second game.
Brunson had a poor shooting night but still managed to record a double-double with 10 assists.
